page.title: 09CLUBS
page.content: There are a large number of clubs and societies that meet regularly in the area:- Talybont Football Club who play in the Aberystwyth and District League. The Badminton Club who play un a local league. Talybont Snooker Club Darts Teams attached to the Black Lion and White Lion Hotels. 'Merched y Wawr' a club for ladies which is run entirely through the medium of the Welsh language The Womens Institute Aelwyd yr Urdd a club for teenagers run through the medium of Welsh Y Gymdeithas Undebol a non-denominational society run by the local chapels. Clwb yr Henoed a club for the senior citizens.
